title: Energy Policy, Tech CEO's Testify, Stimulus
itunes:title: Energy Policy, Tech CEO's Testify, Stimulus
description:
Guests: Ben Brody, Bloomberg Tech lobbying reporter, Stef Feldman, Policy Advisor for the Joe Biden for President campaign, Mercedes Schlapp, Senior Advisor for the Trump campaign, Joe Crowley, former New York Congressman, Amos Snead, Executive Vice President at ADFERO, and Congressman Denver Riggleman, a Republican representing Virginia's 5th district.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
